description:
Veros is a zero-fee fundraising platform where the majority of all advertisement revenue funnels directly into fundraisers launched on the platform. Veros was built from the ashes of an old project that was abandoned by its creators. When the previous founders took the money and ran, they left behind a community of people in shambles, without a hope for revival. From this, Veros Digital Hearts was born. Veros Digital Hearts converted all of the worthless tokens from the old project into new VRS tokens, ready to be used on the Veros global fundraising platform. Veros’ core essence is to proliferate philanthropy. It is where we came from, and where we are headed.

Veros | VRS – will help to unite the efforts of many companies to combat environmental problems and create an ecological community in which only companies that adhere to the principle of environmental friendliness can join. VRS Cryptocurrency for which you can buy both food and technology products from VeDH Platform's projects or its partners. Also, with the help of this crypto currency, everyone can help new environmental projects, which will be placed on the investment site. For the placement and successful collection of the project on the investment site a certain commission (VRS) will be charged up to 5 % and used to finance various eco-events. All placed eco-projects on the investment site will have to accept VRS tokens for their services or goods.
name: Veros
